messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
Could you let me know the place you’ll be starting from (city name, address, or coordinates)? Then I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I actually don't know my exact location right now.

No problem—just let me know roughly where you’re starting (a nearby city, neighborhood, landmark, or an approximate latitude/longitude if you have it), and I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you.
I'm sorry, but I don't have that info either.

No worries. Without a starting point I can’t give you a precise, point-to-point distance, but here are some ball-park driving distances to the Golden Gate Bridge from a few well-known places. (Distances are rounded and follow the most common road route.)

• Fisherman’s Wharf (San Francisco): ≈ 5 km / 3 mi  
• Union Square (downtown SF): ≈ 7 km / 4 mi  
• Oakland City Center: ≈ 21 km / 13 mi  
• Berkeley (UC campus): ≈ 19 km / 12 mi  
• Sausalito (downtown): ≈ 4 km / 2.5 mi  
• San Francisco International Airport (SFO): ≈ 30 km / 19 mi  
• San Jose (downtown): ≈ 80 km / 50 mi  
• Sacramento (Capitol): ≈ 140 km / 87 mi  
• Yosemite Valley Visitor Center: ≈ 300 km / 186 mi  
• Los Angeles (Downtown): ≈ 560 km / 350 mi  

If you get even a rough idea of where you are—city name, a nearby landmark, or smartphone GPS coordinates—let me know and I can give you a much more accurate figure.
You’re welcome! If you ever need a more precise distance or have other questions, feel free to let me know. Safe travels!
